, C.DECLARATION_NO
FROM BOARD A JOIN MEMBER B ON (A.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO)
LEFT OUTER JOIN DECLARATION C ON (C.DECLARATION_N_NO = A.BOARD_NO AND C.DECLARATION_C_NO = '2' AND C.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo})
WHERE A.BOARD_NO=#{boardNo}
SELECT * FROM REPLY JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} ORDER BY REPLY_CREATE_DATE DESC
